name: @appatonce/node-sdk-examples
description: Example applications and test suites for AppAtOnce Node.js SDK

scripts.test:all: npm run test:comprehensive && npm run test:search && npm run test:realtime && npm run test:new-features
scripts.examples: echo 'Available examples:' && echo '- npm run test:comprehensive (Basic CRUD and queries)' && echo '- npm run test:search (Search functionality)' && echo '- npm run test:realtime (Real-time features)' && echo '- npm run test:new-features (v2.0 features)' && echo '- npm run test:oauth (OAuth integration)' && echo '- npm run test:all (Run all tests)'

author: AppAtOnce Team
